description:
A versatile shoe to help you tackle any project. With sticky Vibram XS Grip rubber and a supportive double midsole, the Oasi let you transfer all your skill to the wall. The thin 3.5mm sole gives you the sensitivity you need to feel those tiny footholds to help get you to new heights.

  • Microfibre upper ensures a consistent fit over time
  • Stretchy 2-layer Lycra® tongue conforms to your instep while wicking away sweat, helping keep your feet dry
  • Draxtor Velcro® straps provides precise and independent tension control to ensure a snug fit all over
  • 3.5 mm curved Vibram® XS Grip™ rubber outsole provides exceptional friction and feel
  • 5 micro-layer insole lets you feel all those small movements that make a big difference
  • Friction lock fit keeps you feeling connected for easier heel hooking
  • Precision fit holds your feet like a glove for greater control
name: Tenaya Oasi Rock Shoes - Unisex
